about_the_game:
Unlock new mysteries and adventures! Continue your enchanting journey with the "Connected Hearts: Hour of the Witch" DLC, offering 4 stunning new locations filled with hidden objects, intriguing puzzles, and deep secrets. Dive even deeper into the kingdom of Aradon, uncover more details about its characters, and explore curious places that will captivate your imagination. Each new area brings thrilling activities that enrich the original story, with engaging challenges and lore that will leave you wanting more!

Get ready to expand your adventure, dive deeper into the lore, and unravel the secrets that will shape the fate of Aurora, Adrian, and the entire kingdom of Aradon!

💘 EXPLORE JULIAN’S TENT!

Examine the knight's equipment, investigate the kingdom's map, and discover crucial records hidden within this mysterious camp. Play mini-games and unlock valuable insights that will aid you on your quest.

💘 FIND OUT YOUR FUTURE! 

Enter the shaman’s tent and unravel the ancient practice of divination. Search for hidden objects and solve puzzles to have the shaman Selena reveal the secrets of your destiny—through bones, feathers, and fortune-telling rituals.

💘 COMMUNICATE WITH THE SOULS OF WITCHES! 

Step into a haunted cemetery and uncover long-forgotten secrets. Use a magical orb to contact the souls of witches and extract vital information that could change your fate.

💘 BREAK THE SCRUGG CURSE! 

Solve intricate puzzles to unlock the power of a towering, enchanted oak tree. Covered in glowing runes and reaching into the clouds, this tree holds the key to breaking the curse that haunts your path.

Unlock the hidden mysteries of Aradon with the "Connected Hearts: Hour of the Witch" DLC! Dive into new, enchanted locations, solve ancient puzzles, and uncover secrets that could change the fate of the kingdom forever.
